Through His Gift of Sight Loss, Clark Roberts Teaches Schools, Businesses, and Non-Profits to Navigate and Lead Through Adversity

Join our newsletter to stay connected with our mission of inspiring measurable acts of compassion and kindness in communities worldwide.

Learn MoreJoin Newsletter

Meet Clark Roberts

Executive Director and founder of Ultimate Vision. A husband, father, and PaPa who lost his sight at age 24 to Retinitis Pigmentosa but gained a deeper vision for life. Clark teaches students and adults to recognize kindness, live fully, and lead through adversity.

If you resonate with our mission, reach out. We're here to walk with you.

Book Now

Clark's Story

Watch Clark share his journey of turning sight loss into a gift that inspires thousands.

Impacting Lives Nationwide

Clark lost his sight at 24 but gained a deeper vision for life. He sees beyond appearances, focusing on the heart.

Educate

We offer vital programs such as Kids EDGE - an Exceptionally Diverse Guided Educational Program for preschool to 2nd grade.

Motivate

Our presentations develop confident and compassionate leaders, inspiring people to recognize their potential beyond limitations.

Inspire

Our purpose is to inspire youth by promoting kindness, compassion, and inclusion, encouraging them to discover their potential.

Contact Us To Learn More

Our Mission

We guide future leaders to see life through a lens of Compassion, Kindness, and Empathy, being Confident, embracing their potential to live a life of significance.

Our Vision

We inspire youth to identify their potential through a greater understanding of Kindness, Compassion, and Inclusion.

Programs for Every Community

Book us in your school, business, or place of worship, and allow us to Educate, Motivate, and Inspire.

Schools

We teach students to live a life where they have a growth mindset, choosing kindness and actions that support and encourage others.

Corporate

Rediscover the power of working as part of a team, discover tools useful in both professional and personal lives.

Dine in the Dark

A unique opportunity under blindfold that brings a greater understanding of empathy.

Faith Based

Learn to trust and find hope in the unseen. Clark shares how God gave him the gift of sight-loss to encourage others.

Contact Us

Ready to bring compassion and kindness to your community? We're here to help.
